LanguageData.VFEM_BringIngredientsDesc: Extract ingredients from adjacent hoppers to start the process
LanguageData.VFEMech.MustPlaceOnFactoryFloor: Must be placed directly on a factory floor.
LanguageData.VFEMech.MustPlaceOnPowerConduit: Must be placed directly on a power conduit.
LanguageData.VFEM_SiloAimAtQuestSite: Location does not contain object big enough to target
LanguageData.GizmoDescriptionSmall: Have the Fish Taunter catch small fish.
LanguageData.GizmoDescriptionMedium: Have the Fish Taunter catch medium fish.
LanguageData.GizmoDescriptionLarge: Have the Fish Taunter catch large fish.
LanguageData.VFEM.RelaxingMusicDesc: Play relaxing music, making anyone that hears it a bit happier.
LanguageData.VFEM.InspirationalMusicDesc: Play inspirational music, motivating pawns to work harder.
LanguageData.VFEM.IdeoPropagandaDesc: Play propaganda music, increasing the certainty of colonists.
LanguageData.VFEM.RecruitmentDesc: Play music that is liked by prisoners, reducing their resistance.
LanguageData.VFEM.SelectIdeologyDesc: Select ideology the autobroadcaster should tune its music to.
LanguageData.VFEMech.LetterJoinOfferText: As a sign of trust and appreciation, {PAWN_nameDef} believes that {PAWN_pronoun} can be a valuable help in your colony. {PAWN_pronoun} wishes to join you permanently.
LanguageData.VFEMech.RaidWarningText: {FACTION_name} will raid you within the upcoming 12 hours. {1}
LanguageData.VFEMech.AdjustIncidentTimeInterval: Adjust the interval of ship landings:
LanguageData.VFEMech.AdjustIncidentChanceLabel: Adjust base chance for ship landing incidents:
LanguageData.VFEMech.AdjustMechPresenceLabel: Adjust mechanoid presence generated by ships:
LanguageData.VFEMech.AdjustMinimunColonistCountLabel: Adjust minimum colonist count required for ship landing incidents:
LanguageData.VFEMech.AdjustMinimunWealthCountLabel: Adjust minimum wealth count required for ship landing incidents:
LanguageData.VFEMech.AdjustMaximumDistanceForShipsLab: Adjust maximum distance for ship landing sites:
LanguageData.VFEM_factorySpeedMultiplierTooltip: Factory speed multiplier. Default is 1. Lower numbers accelerate factory modules' speed, while higher numbers make them work slower.
LanguageData.VFEM_SuperComputerResearchPointYield: Supercomputer research point yield value. Default is 1.
LanguageData.VFEMech.FactionDestroyedShipDesc: Through clever strategies, large number of casualties and incredible perseverance, {FACTION_name} managed to destroy {1}.
LanguageData.VFEMech.SetIdeologyConversionTargetDesc: Select the ideology that the selected colonist should be converted to.
